name: Tower's Call
description:
You don't know who you are and you see yourself in a ruin overcome by a forest. The one thing that gets your attention is the big tower sprouting from the horizon.

To get there you'll need to go through 3 puzzles to get the keys for the tower's door to prove your worth as a strategist and be able to proceed to the other side.

Will you be able to open the tower's door?

"Tower's Call - Instructions" is a written walkthrough of how to finish the game if you happen to not know how to complete all the puzzles

Controls: WASD to walk and LMB to interact
